location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Telegram from Sir Lewis Pelly, Baroda to the Foreign Secretary, Calcutta

mods.abstract: Telegram sent to Charles Umpherston Aitchison, Foreign Secretary to the Government of India regarding conversations with the Maharaja of Scindhia (Jayajirao Sindhia) in which the Maharaja had expressed his concerns over the public scandal that the Commission would bring, and asking permission to have a private interview with the Gaekwar of Baroda (Malharrao).The response to this telegram is at folios 8-10.
